reasoning: Autism measured as prevalence in children, not incidence. CDC ADDM data from 2002 (published 2007) showed 6.6 per 1,000 8-year-olds (660 per 100k children).
source: CDC Autism and Developmental Disabilities Monitoring Network (2007). Prevalence of autism spectrum disorders. MMWR Surveill Summ. 56(1):12-28
